articles.title: Asian shares edge up from near two-year lows as U.S. inflation data looms - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares squeezed higher on Wednesday from close to two-year lows hit in the previous session while the dollar held steady, ahead of keenly awaited U.S. inflation data that will offer a guide to how aggressively the Federal Reserve will raise rates.
